description.narrative: During the country program significant progress was made including commitment from the Government of Sudan to join the SUN movement, the establishment of country networks, the development of a national Investment Case and the strong inclusion of multisectoral action for nutrition in the Multi-Year Humanitarian Response Plan (MYHRP). | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:16/01/2018
